CSharpenFilter
public
IImageFilter
public
CRefCount
CSharpenFilter

Defines an image filter for performing sharpening.

Image Filter Parameters
"Threshold" : int

Threshold for determining whether a pixel is an edge

"Boost"  : int

Amount to boost signal at edge pixels

Functions
CreateSharpenFilter
CRefObj<IImageFilter> CreateSharpenFilter()

Creates a sharpen filter.

Returns

Returns the filter for performing image sharpening.

Apply

IImage* pImage,
ImageFilterParams* pParams
)

Defines an image filter for performing gaussian blurring.

Parameters
pImage
IImage*

image to perform filtering on.

pParams
ImageFilterParams*

filter parameters.

Returns

Returns the filtered image.
